Detailed Description

POIContact POIContact (Point of Interest: Contact) is used to track contact points (i.e. collisions) that might affect AIs.

POIContact class: Used to track contact points (i.e. collisions) that might.

Member Function Documentation

f32 POIContact::GetImpact ( void   )  [inline]

Returns the strength of the impact that caused this contact.

Returns:
f32 - Strength of the contact.

void POIContact::SetImpact ( f32  Impact  )  [inline]

Set the strength of the impact that caused this contact. The larger the number, to more significant the impact.
